name: Naira Marley
description: '''Azeez Adeshina Fashola'''{{Audio|Azeez_Adeshina_Fashola.wav|listen}} (born 10 May 1991), known professionally as '''Naira Marley''', is a Nigerian-British singer, songwriter and rapper.His fans are fondly called Marlians. His label became home to names like [[MohBad|MOHBAD]], [[Zinoleesky]], Vusic amongst others.
